org.openimaj.image.processing.resize

Interface ResizeFilterFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BellFilter, BlackmanFilter, BoxFilter, BSplineFilter, CatmullRomFilter, HammingFilter, HanningFilter, HermiteFilter, Lanczos3Filter, MitchellFilter, PointFilter, TriangleFilter

    public interface ResizeFilterFunction
    The interpolation filter function used for the resampling function.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
